login.title: Sign in to your account
login.error.unauthorized.title: Configuration Error: Unauthorized Domain
login.error.unauthorized.description: To fix this, add the following domain to your Firebase project's "Authorized domains" list:
login.error.unauthorized.step4: Copy and paste the domain below.
login.error.unauthorized.note: Note: "Sign in with Google" handles both login and registration. You can also use "Offline Mode" to test without Firebase.
login.error.unauthorized.detectFailed: Configuration Error: Could not detect the app's domain. Please check your environment and add the correct domain to Firebase manually.
login.error.generic: An unexpected error occurred during login. Please try again.
login.inAppBrowser.title: Open in an external browser
login.inAppBrowser.body: You're using an in-app browser (LINE/Instagram, etc.). Google sign-in might fail here. Please open this page in Safari or Chrome and try again.
login.inAppBrowser.step1: Tap the share or menu icon in the top-right corner.
login.inAppBrowser.step2: Select "Open in Safari" or "Open in Chrome".
login.inAppBrowser.step3: Return to the login screen and continue.

catalogManager.manage.title: Catalog Items
catalogManager.manage.description: Register multilingual catalog entries with a single lightweight overview image.
catalogManager.manage.offlineNotice: Offline mode: new catalog entries stay on this device until you reconnect.
catalogManager.manage.table.name: Name (JA)
catalogManager.manage.table.empty: No catalog items yet. Add your first product to get started.
catalogManager.manage.modal.title: Add Catalog Item
catalogManager.manage.form.descriptionHe: Short summary that appears on the mobile detail view. Markdown support is coming later.
catalogManager.manage.form.imageHelper: Upload one square image (JPG/PNG, up to ~1 MB). It will be reused in thumbnails and details.
catalogManager.manage.errors.fetchFailed: We couldn’t load catalog items. Check your connection and try again.
catalogManager.manage.errors.createFaile: Failed to save the catalog item. Please try again.
catalogManager.title: Product Catalog Management
catalogManager.shortDescription: Plan the new catalog experience so registration, discovery, and detail views stay fast on mobile.
catalogManager.phase1.title: Phase 1 · Catalog Registration (fastest loop)
catalogManager.phase1.goal: Goal: Register → list → search → detail flows run smoothly on phones.
catalogManager.fields.nameJa.label: Name (Japanese)
catalogManager.fields.nameJa.notes: Primary display label. Always shown in list, search, and detail views.
catalogManager.fields.mainImage.label: Main image
catalogManager.fields.mainImage.notes: One representative image. Generate a lightweight thumbnail for list/detail.
catalogManager.fields.skuOrTag.label: SKU or tag
catalogManager.fields.skuOrTag.notes: Use for structured search or grouping. Hide the field on detail view when empty.
catalogManager.fields.nameEn.label: Name (English)
catalogManager.fields.nameEn.notes: Optional translation. Only render when provided.
catalogManager.fields.nameZh.label: Name (Chinese)
catalogManager.fields.nameZh.notes: Optional translation. Only render when provided.
catalogManager.phase1.acceptance.registe: Users can register a catalog item, see it in the list, and open the detail view without breaks.
catalogManager.phase1.acceptance.lazyIma: Image loads are lightweight (reuse thumbnails) and lazy-load on mobile.
catalogManager.phase1.acceptance.searchN: Search finds matches even when users mix full-width/half-width characters or common kanji numerals.
catalogManager.phase2.title: Phase 2 · Store-specific pricing
catalogManager.phase2.goal: Goal: Show the price that is valid today per store × catalog at a glance.
catalogManager.phase2.historyNote: Never overwrite prices—append a new record to keep history.
catalogManager.phase2.acceptance.storeSw: Switching stores updates the current price correctly.
catalogManager.phase2.acceptance.history: Price history remains intact before and after updates.
catalogManager.phase3.title: Phase 3 · Markdown descriptions
catalogManager.phase3.goal: Goal: Handle long-form explanations (with images) safely and smoothly.
catalogManager.phase3.md.customer: Start with customer-facing JA markdown (customer-ja.md). Add EN/ZH files later as needed.
catalogManager.phase3.md.staff: Prepare staff-facing markdown (staff-ja.md) in the same folder when ready.
catalogManager.phase3.md.language: Hide each language tab automatically when the file is missing.
catalogManager.phase3.storage.images: Place images under catalog/{catalogId}/images/ with thumb/medium/original variants.
catalogManager.phase3.storage.lazy: Load markdown and images lazily to keep detail tabs responsive.
catalogManager.phase3.mdWhy.lightweight: Lightweight and robust: keep long text out of the database, transfer only changed files.
catalogManager.phase3.mdWhy.imageSeparat: Separate images from text so we can serve thumb/medium/original variants.
catalogManager.phase3.mdWhy.editFriendly: Easy to edit: manual replacement now, editor UI later.
catalogManager.phase3.mdWhy.multilingual: Strong for multilingual rollout with language-specific files.
catalogManager.phase3.mdWhy.aiReady: AI/RAG ready: structured text is easy to ingest for future assistants.
catalogManager.phase3.acceptance.perform: Long descriptions stay smooth to scroll thanks to thumbnails and lazy loading.
catalogManager.phase3.acceptance.simple: Replacing descriptions is a simple file update.
catalogManager.integration.title: Integration notes
catalogManager.integration.inventory: Inventory: no changes now—optionally surface related catalogs in detail views.
catalogManager.integration.search: Search: extend the existing normalization flow to include catalog name / SKU / tags.
catalogManager.integration.i18n: i18n: add every new label to both locales/en.json and locales/ja.json.
catalogManager.integration.offline: Offline: respect the current isOffline queue for registrations and price updates.
catalogManager.integration.storageRules: Storage rules: allow catalog/{catalogId}/images/* and catalog/{catalogId}/desc/*.md (write access for editors/admins only).
catalogManager.nextSteps.title: Next steps (no code)
catalogManager.nextSteps.caption: Use this checklist to lock the plan with the stakeholders.
catalogManager.nextSteps.catalogForm: Fix the catalog registration form layout (mark required vs optional).
catalogManager.nextSteps.priceForm: Confirm the five pricing fields for store × catalog.
catalogManager.nextSteps.descriptionTarg: Agree to start with customer-facing JA descriptions first.
catalogManager.nextSteps.storageNaming: Document the storage folder and file naming rules on one page.
catalogManager.nextSteps.acceptanceRevie: Review and approve the acceptance criteria for each phase.

import.title: Bulk Import
import.upload.title: Upload Item CSV file
import.upload.description: If a 'sku' is provided and exists, the item is updated. Otherwise, a new item is created. The 'name' column is required for all new items.
import.locations.title: Bulk Import Locations
import.locations.upload.title: Upload Location CSV file
import.locations.upload.description: To create a sub-location, provide its parent's ID in the 'parentHumanId' column. If 'parentHumanId' is empty, a new parent location will be created, and 'humanId' becomes required. Existing locations are updated based on a matching 'humanId' (for parents) or a matching 'parentHumanId' and 'name' (for sub-locations).
import.confirm.title: Confirm Import
import.confirm.message: This will import the file '{fileName}' into the store '{storeName}'. Are you sure you want to continue?
import.errors.missingName: Name is required for new items.
import.errors.duplicateName: An item with the name '{name}' already exists. To update it, provide its SKU.
import.errors.invalidCost: Invalid value for {field}. Must be a number.
import.errors.invalidBoolean: Invalid value for isDiscontinued. Use TRUE or FALSE.
import.errors.missingHumanIdForParent: humanId is required for parent locations (when parentHumanId is empty).
import.errors.parentNotFound: Parent location with humanId '{humanId}' not found in this store.
import.errors.duplicateHumanId: A parent location with humanId '{humanId}' already exists in this store.
import.errors.duplicateSubLocationName: A sub-location named '{name}' already exists under parent '{parentHumanId}'.
import.errors.noStoreSelected: Please select a store before importing locations.
